vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.40;
son of: Malchijah (H4441);
father of: Michael (H4317J)
§ Baaseiah = "in the service of Jehovah"
a Gershonite Levite, one of the forefathers of Asaph the singer
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Malquías; ancestro de Asaf; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴西雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "服事耶和華"
一名利未人, 亞薩的先祖 (代上 6:40)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴西雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "服事耶和华"
一名利未人, 亚萨的先祖 (代上 6:40)
